overview: Sex addicts a group of perverts so intensely that they have to go to group therapy to try to cure their addiction. A very difficult thing if everyone around is exciting you every single moment. Jessy, for example, as soon as she sees her maid (gorgeous MILF Shay Fox), has no option but get back in the saddle. Realistically, what would you do if you met Stevie Shae or Alby Rydes? Then there's an Albanese sex addict goddess, dressed like a whore, and how she likes to be treated like one. Or then there's Marina Angel who loves turning on men, whether he's her new boyfriend or the therapist. Clearly no one is going to get cured here, but who cares when you're getting non-stop blowjobs and shags?!
title: Sex Junkies
